title: Watermelon Lovers üçâ
description: Senior design project at UT Austin creating a consumer-friendly tool for evaluating watermelon quality and ripeness using acoustic and visual analysis. Features machine learning algorithms, signal processing, and a Flask-based web interface for user interaction.

title: Orientalism in Frank Herbert's Dune: A Critical Analysis
description: Master's thesis examining Orientalist themes and tropes in Frank Herbert's science fiction novel 'Dune' through the lens of Edward Said's postcolonial theory. Analyzes Herbert's use of Islamic and Arab terminology, desert imagery, and cultural references to construct the Fremen society, while exploring how the author both employs and subverts traditional Orientalist frameworks to critique Western imperialism and technological advancement.
